resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/78213</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78213</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>414eecfa-ff44-4502-2a6b-67bfe628214a#1#8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A trompe l'oeil reneszánsza</string>
            <string language="en">trompe l'oeil renaissance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">trompe l'oeil Renaissance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la Renaissance de l'oeil de trompe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">renascimento do l'oeil do trompe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rinascita del l'oeil del trompe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">trompe l'oeil αναγέννηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">renacimiento del l'oeil del trompe</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A műfaj megújulása, illetve szerepének, jelentésének módosulása</string>
            <string language="en">the regeneration of the genre, respectively changing of role and meaning</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">illuzionizmus,  művészetelmélet,   trompe l'oeil ,  szürrealista,  </string>
            <string language="en">illusionism, art theory, trompe l'oeil, surrealist</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Regeneration des Genren, der Rolle 
beziehungsweise ändern und Bedeutung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la régénération du genre, changer 
respectivement du rôle et signification</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a regeneração do genre, respectivamente 
mudança do papel e significado</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la rigenerazione del genere, rispettivamente 
cambiare del ruolo e significare</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η αναγέννηση του ύφους, αντίστοιχα να αλλάξει του 
ρόλου και σημασία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la regeneración del género, respectivamente 
el cambiar del papel y el significar</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">illusionism, kunsttheorie, trompe l'oeil, 
surrealistisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">illusionism, théorie d'art, l'oeil de trompe, 
surréaliste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">illusionism, teoria da arte, l'oeil do trompe, 
surrealist</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">illusionism, teoria di arte, l'oeil del trompe, 
surrealist</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">illusionism, θεωρία τέχνης, trompe l'oeil, 
υπερρεαλιστική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">illusionism, teoría del arte, l'oeil del trompe, 
surrealista</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">15-16</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>78213</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>

</expression>
